title: i cant play now :( .
body: i cant play now  because when i picked my champ after game started my monitor all black and "INPUT NOT SUPPORTED" someone help me plz

replies.body:
Input not supported is a good sign that something is going on with your resolution settings in the config files. Let's try resetting those back to default and see if that does the trick!

- Log into the game client.
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file named game.cfg and persistedsettings.json
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. Leave game to sync settings.
